metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18848 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The json-jwt gem before 1.11.0 for Ruby lacks an element count during thesplitting of a JWE string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18848` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-json-jwt - 1.11.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-json-jwt package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.0-1').
